name: Sandra Fleming Chronicles: Crystal Skulls
storyline: The legendary Crystal Skulls have been lost for centuries. Harold Wagner, curator of the Jefferson Museum of Archeology, hires Sandra Fleming to find them. Her search takes her to a volcanic island, the mountains of Nepal and the Amazon jungle, where she stumbles upon a dark secret. Can Sandra find the Skulls and lift the curse? Do the legendary artifacts truly possess mystical powers, or is their magic nothing more than a myth? Join Sandra on her danger-filled journey!
summary: Do the Crystal Skulls truly possess mystical powers, or is their magic nothing more than a myth? Join Sandra Fleming on her danger-filled journey to find the legendary artifacts!
